heading: in 'n' out
subheading: the families of the three us servicemen freed by yugoslavia over the weekend were flown to germany for a reunion on monday. vivian ramirez noticed that her son looked thin, so she took along a bag of his favorite hamburgers. the soldiers were taken captive while patrolling the yugoslav-macedonian border. the reverend jesse jackson arranged for their release and accompanied them to freedom.
author: wired staff
text: the families of the three us servicemen freed by yugoslavia over the weekend were flown to germany for a reunion on monday. vivian ramirez noticed that her son looked thin, so she took along a bag of his favorite hamburgers. the soldiers were taken captive while patrolling the yugoslav-macedonian border. the reverend jesse jackson arranged for their release and accompanied them to freedom.
